metadata.title: Masonry Cleaner and Efflorescence Remover (Acid Free) (Gallon)
features: CONCENTRATED FORMULA, MAKES UP TO 10 GALLONS.
Stronger than Muriatic Yet 100% Acid Free, No Neutralizing Step Required
Non-Fuming, Non-Corrosive, Non-D.O.T. Regulated, Removes Concrete
Safe on Glass, Safe on Plants, Safe on Skin
description: Is a specially formulated 100% acid free masonry cleaner and efflorescence remover. It is not only the world's strongest masonry cleaner, it is also the safest. Independent test confirms that its synthetic acid formula dissolves more calcium carbonate and efflorescence than muriatic, (hydrochloric) or phosphoric acid base cleaners, which are also harmful. It will safely and quickly clean pavers, brick, concrete, river rock, architectural concrete and retainer walls while dissolving all signs efflorescence. It is color safe, non-fuming and is safe for use in and around food processing and equipment areas. It is 100% biodegradable, water soluble, non-flammable, non-toxic and easy to use. DILUTION RATION: LIGHT to MODERATE CLEANING - 10:1, MODERATE to HEAVY - 8:1, HEAVY to EXTRA HEAVY - 3:1, CONCRETE STRIPPING - 1:1

title: GP66 Green Miracle Cleaner Demonstration
Concrete Acid Etcher That is Safe & Can Remove Efflorescence
I use this in my pressure washer.
Miracle Sealants Heavy Duty Acid Cleaner
Apply Akona Concrete/Masonry Restoration Cleaner
This really does clean everything
Simple Green Oxy Solve Total Outdoor Cleaner
